p: The chemicals 1, 1,-diphenyl-2-picryl-hydroxyl (DPPH, #D9132), dimethyl sulphoxide (DMSO, #D8418), 3-(4, 5-dimethylthiazol-2-yl)-2, 5-diphenyltetrazolium bromide (MTT, #M5655), Folin–Ciocalteu reagent (FCR, #F9252), methanol (#646377), fetal bovine serum (FBS, #F0926), phosphate-buffered saline (PBS, #3818), quercetin (QE, #Q4951), and hydrogen peroxide (H₂O₂, #H1009) were procured from Sigma Aldrich.
